TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供更安全的方法，以指定使用 SQL Server 驗證的登入密碼。

span.span: provides a more secure way to specify the password for a login attempt using SQL Server Authentication.

summary.span: 由將用於 SQL Server 驗證的使用者識別碼和密碼組成。

span.span: is comprised of a user id and a password that will be used for SQL Server Authentication.

summary.span: 物件中的密碼是 型別。

span.span: The password in a object is of type .

summary.span: Windows 驗證 () 會維持最安全的方式，來登入 SQL Server 資料庫。

span.span: Windows Authentication () remains the most secure way to log in to a SQL Server database.
